root.message: The INST_MANDATE field for indicator 13-2-2, translated into en
root.data:
• Reporting requirements for Annex I Parties – https://unfccc.int/process-andmeetings/transparency-and-reporting/reporting-and-review-under-the-convention/greenhousegas-inventories-annex-i-parties/reporting-requirements
